articles.description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta says winger Bukayo Saka will miss "many weeks" with a hamstring injury.
articles.title: Bukayo Saka injury: Arsenal winger out for 'many weeks' with hamstring injury

articles.description: BBC Sport assesses the heavyweight division after Usyk-Fury 2, including what could be next for the biggest contenders as well as the fights we want to see in 2025.
articles.title: Boxing: Oleksandr Usyk, Tyson Fury, Daniel Dubois - how is heavyweight division shaping up?

articles.description: Set pieces used to be seen as the reserve of the underdog, but they are currently all the rage - so what goes into them?
articles.title: Deliver, timing and the 'dark arts' - the anatomy of a set piece

articles.description: Jayden Daniels produces an incredible performance as the Washington Commanders beat the Philadelphia Eagles, while the Dallas Cowboys and San Francisco 49ers are eliminated from the play-offs.
articles.title: NFL Results & Week 16 recap: Jayden Daniels stars, Cowboys & 49ers out of play-offs

articles.description: Fifa adapts its transfer regulations on an interim basis after the recent Lassana Diarra legal ruling but accepts they could be open to immediate challenge.
articles.title: Lassana Diarra: Fifa adapts transfer regulations after ruling over former France international

articles.description: Two-time doubles Grand Slam champion Max Purcell takes voluntary suspension after admitting anti-doping breach.
articles.title: Max Purcell: Wimbledon men's doubles champion provisionally suspended after anti-doping breach

articles.description: Fast bowler Kate Cross has recovered from an injury to be named in the England squad for the Women's Ashes starting in Australia next month.
articles.title: Kate Cross returns as England name Women's Ashes squad

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at what leaders Liverpool and bottom side Southampton can learn from previous Christmas Day tables.
articles.title: Premier League: Do the team top at Christmas usually win title?

articles.description: British number one Katie Boulter announces her engagement to Australian world number nine Alex de Minaur.
articles.title: Katie Boulter & Alex de Minaur announce engagement

articles.description: Tiger Woods' son Charlie Woods, 15, hits a first hole-in-one at the PNC Championship before Padraig Harrington's son Paddy emulates the feat.
articles.title: Tiger Woods' son Charlie Woods, 15, hits hole-in-one at PNC Championship
